description: This header file declares functions and macros related to retrieving various predefined and configurable filesystem paths used within the system, such as paths for dynamic, static, configuration, statistic, telemetry, and certificate bundle files. The file provides constants and external function declarations to fetch these paths, often involving property retrieval and memory management as noted in comments.

methods.name: getDynamicPath
methods.description: Returns the path where dynamic files are stored; the caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: getDynamicConfigPath
methods.description: Returns the path for dynamic config files, typically dynamic path + /etc; caller must free.

methods.name: getStaticPath
methods.description: Returns the static files path, typically the static path; caller must free.

methods.name: getStaticConfigPath
methods.description: Returns the static config files path, typically static path + /etc; caller must free.

methods.name: getBrandDefaultsPath
methods.description: Returns the default configuration path for the current firmware brand; caller must free.

methods.name: getStatisticPath
methods.description: Returns the statistics files path; caller must free.

methods.name: getTelemetryPath
methods.description: Returns the telemetry data files path; caller must free.

methods.name: getPropertyAsPath
methods.description: Retrieves a property value as a path, returning default if not found; caller must free if not NULL.

methods.name: getCABundlePath
methods.description: Returns the path to the trusted CA bundle file.
